topic.title: Overview reports
topic.p: Information from project reports is aggregated and displayed in several fields.
This sample project contains the following fields, when accessible:

list.li: Project name and location. Location is displayed if a project is hosted on a publicly available repository like GitHub.
Date and time of the latest %product% inspection.

Bar chart containing report statistics. Here, each bar represents a %product% report and all bars are clickable, so you can load the report you would like to overview by clicking the respective bar. The bar color reflects the severity of the major part of detected problems. The rightmost bar summarizes the latest inspection report and provides the number of problems detected.

topic.tip: Projects without uploaded reports can be deleted.
topic.p: This table shows how %product_cloud% interprets and displays several reports (or bars in the bar chart) depending on their metadata.

tr.td: The latest report and overwrites the previous reports

topic.p: To see a specific %product% report, click the bar in the bar chart. This will open the %product% report page described in the User interface overview section.
